author: xtqqczze
body:
It appears the Codacy PR review check is no longer running for new PRs.

I wonder whether this is intentional as I don't see any discussion of the change.

comments.author: ameliavp
comments.body: Hey! Amélia at Codacy here. Can you please confirm if the project is still in Codacy? We checked and it seems like it's not and that may be the reason why it's not running for new PRs. Thank you! @xtqqczze @iSazonov @TravisEz13

comments.author: ameliavp
comments.body:
Thank you @xtqqczze. When looking into it, it's probably because the new checks are not turned on. Can you check this from your side, please? The page we have with this information is very straightforward, I'll leave it here so you can take a look: https://docs.codacy.com/faq/repositories/how-do-i-set-codacy-as-a-required-check-to-merge-prs/ please let me know if this helps, otherwise, I'll make sure to take this issue internally and get back to you. Thank you!
How do I set Codacy as a required check to merge pull requests? - Codacy docs
Documentation for the Codacy automated code review tool

title: meta: Codacy PR review
